<line: 31> A lawsuit has been filed against you. 

[TEXT]
<line: 33> Within 21 days after service of this summons on you (not counting the day you received 
<line: 34> it) — or 60 days if you are the United States or a United States agency, or an officer or employee 
<line: 35> of the United States described in Fed. R. Civ. P. 12 (a)(2) or (3) — you must serve on the 
<line: 36> plaintiff an answer to the attached complaint or a motion under Rule 12 of the Federal Rules of 
<line: 37> Civil Procedure. The answer or motion must be served on the plaintiff or plaintiff’s attorney, 
<line: 38> whose name and address are: 

[TEXT]
<line: 40> Juan A. Fernandez-Barquin, P.A. 
<line: 41> 3663 SW 8th Street 
<line: 42> Suite 200 
<line: 43> Miami, Florida 33135 

[TEXT]
<line: 45> If you fail to respond, judgment by default will be entered against you for the relief 
<line: 46> demanded in the complaint.   You also must file your answer or motion with the court.
